column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were seated quickly and our waiter was very friendly. We ordered our pizza and beers
column2: and our waiter warned us that the pizzas are made to order and do take some time. I think our wait was close to an hour
column3: but I amused myself with editing photos from our Chicago exploring that morning. However
column4: I would consider the fact that Lou's would not be a good lunch option for those working close by as it can take some time.
